# netapp-ontap_protocols_san_lun-maps_data_source (Data Source)

ProtocolsSanLunMaps data source

## Example Usage
```terraform
data "netapp-ontap_protocols_san_lun-maps_data_source" "example" {
  cx_profile_name = "example_profile"

  filter {
    igroup {
      name = "example_igroup"
    }
    lun {
      name = "example_lun"
    }
    svm {
      name = "example_svm"
    }
  }
}
```
